entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
